TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit JsonSerializer extends System.Object
public ref class JsonSerializer abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供将对象或值类型序列化为 JSON 以及将 JSON 反序列化为对象或值类型的功能。

span.span: Provides functionality to serialize objects or value types to JSON and to deserialize JSON into objects or value types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
For more information, see <bpt id="p1">[</bpt>How to serialize and deserialize JSON<ept id="p1">](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to)</ept>.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Deserialize (ReadOnlySpan<byte>? utf8Json, Type? returnType, System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options = default);

static member Deserialize : ReadOnlySpan<byte> * Type * System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions -> obj
public static object Deserialize (ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8Json, Type returnType, System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options = default);

param.name: utf8Json
param.span: 要分析的 JSON 文本。

span.span: The JSON text to parse.

param.name: returnType
param.span: 要转换为并返回的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the object to convert to and return.

param.name: options
param.span: 分析期间用于控制行为的选项。

span.span: Options to control the behavior during parsing.

summary.span: 将表示单个 JSON 值的 UTF-8 编码文本分析为指定类型的实例。

span.span: Parses the UTF-8 encoded text representing a single JSON value into an instance of a specified type.
A representation of the JSON value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
For more information, see <bpt id="p1">[</bpt>How to serialize and deserialize JSON<ept id="p1">](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to)</ept>.

span.span: is .
The JSON is invalid.
-or-
is not compatible with the JSON.
-or-

span.span: There is remaining data in the span beyond a single JSON value.

exception.span: 或其可序列化成员没有兼容的 。

span.span: There is no compatible for or its serializable members.

summary.span: 将表示单个 JSON 值的文本分析为指定类型的实例。

span.span: Parses the text representing a single JSON value into an instance of a specified type.
A representation of the JSON value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Using a <xref:System.String> is not as efficient as using the UTF-8 methods since the implementation natively uses UTF-8. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to).

span.span: or is .
The JSON is invalid.
-or-
is not compatible with the JSON.
-or-

exception.span: 单个 JSON 值以外的字符串中存在剩余数据。

span.span: There is remaining data in the string beyond a single JSON value.

exception.span: 或其可序列化成员没有兼容的 。

span.span: There is no compatible for or its serializable members.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Deserialize (ref System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader reader, Type? returnType, System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options = default);
.method public static hidebysig object Deserialize(valuetype System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader& reader, class System.Type returnType, class System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options) cil managed
Public Shared Function Deserialize (ByRef reader As Utf8JsonReader, returnType As Type, Optional options As JsonSerializerOptions = Nothing) As Object
static member Deserialize : Utf8JsonReader * Type * System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions -> obj
public static object Deserialize (ref System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader reader, Type returnType, System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options = default);

param.name: reader
param.span: 要从中读取 JSON 的读取器。

span.span: The reader to read the JSON from.

param.name: returnType
param.span: 要转换为并返回的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the object to convert to and return.

param.name: options
param.span: 读取期间用于控制序列化程序行为的选项。

span.span: Options to control the serializer behavior during reading.

summary.span: 从提供的读取器读取一个 JSON 值（包括对象或数组）并将它转换为指定类型的实例。

span.span: Reads one JSON value (including objects or arrays) from the provided reader and converts it into an instance of a specified type.
A representation of the JSON value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the <xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.TokenType> property of `reader` is <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.PropertyName?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the reader will be advanced by one call to <xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.Read?displayProperty=nameWithType> to determine the start of the value. 此方法完成后， `reader` 将位于 JSON 值中的最终标记处。Upon completion of this method, `reader` will be positioned at the final token in the JSON value. 如果引发了异常，则读取器将重置为在调用方法时它所处的状态。If an exception is thrown, the reader is reset to the state it was in when the method was called. 此方法会创建读取器所处理的数据的副本，因此，不需要在返回此方法之后维护数据完整性。This method makes a copy of the data the reader acted on, so there is no caller requirement to maintain data integrity beyond the return of this method. 用于创建实例的的在 冲突时优先于。The used to create the instance of the take precedence over the when they conflict. 因此， 在 读取时使用、、和。Hence, , , and are used while reading. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to).

span.span: is .
The JSON is invalid.
-or-
is not compatible with the JSON.
-or-

exception.span: 无法从读取器中读取值。

span.span: A value could not be read from the reader.

exception.span: 使用的是不受支持的选项。

span.span: is using unsupported options.

exception.span: 或其可序列化成员没有兼容的 。

span.span: There is no compatible for or its serializable members.

Public Shared Function Deserialize(Of TValue) (utf8Json As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), Optional options As JsonSerializerOptions = Nothing) As TValue
static member Deserialize : ReadOnlySpan<byte> * System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions -> 'Value
public static TValue Deserialize<TValue> (ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8Json, System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options = default);

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonWriterOptions> used to create the instance of the <xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter> take precedence over the <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions> when they conflict. 因此， 在 编写时使用、、和。Hence, , , and are used while writing. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to).

span.span: is .

exception.span: 或其可序列化成员没有兼容的 。

span.span: There is no compatible for or its serializable members.

summary.span: 将指定类型的值异步转换为 UTF-8 编码的 JSON 文本并将它写入指定流。

span.span: Asynchronously converts the value of a specified type to UTF-8 encoded JSON text and writes it to the specified stream.

returns.span: 表示异步写入操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

## Remarks
